name: max-repel
effect: Used outside of battle : Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon. This effect wears off after the trainer takes 250 steps.
short_effect: For 250 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party’s lead Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer than Super Repel.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer than Super Repel.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item that drives away wild Pokémon so you won’t encounter them. It lasts longer than a Super Repel.
